sentences.en: An ass and an ox, fastened to the same yoke, were drawing a wagon.
sentences.cn: 驴子和公牛一起套在轭上拉车.

sentences.en: At last the Norse yoke was broken by two remarkable men.
sentences.cn: 挪威人的桎梏最终被两个杰出的人物所粉碎.

sentences.en: Every farmer knows how to yoke the oxen together.
sentences.cn: 每个家民都知道怎样把牛拴在一起.

sentences.en: For my yoke is easy and my burden is light.
sentences.cn: 因为我的轭是容易的,我的担子是轻省的.

sentences.en: He felt his neck under Bulstrode's yoke.
sentences.cn: 他感到,他已落在布尔斯特罗德手中.

sentences.en: He had got his neck out of the yoke of matrimony.
sentences.cn: 他已经摆脱了婚姻的枷锁.

sentences.en: In 1783 the American Colonies threw off the yoke of England.
sentences.cn: 北美(十三个)殖民地于一七八三年摆脱了英国的统治.

sentences.en: People are still suffering under the yoke of slavery.
sentences.cn: 人们仍然生活在奴隶制的枷锁之下。

sentences.en: Rising stem - outside screw and yoke is preferred in iron multi - turn valves.
sentences.cn: 明杆 - 外螺纹和支架结构是铸铁多回转阀门的首选结构.

sentences.en: Some designs incorporate a two - piece bonnet and yoke.
sentences.cn: 一些结构由两件式阀盖和轭架组成.

sentences.en: The defeated army passed under the yoke.
The introduction attempts to yoke the pieces together.
sentences.cn: 导言部分试图将各部分硬拼凑在一起。

sentences.en: The plow was pulled by a yoke of oxen.
sentences.cn: 一对公牛同轭拉着一头犁.

sentences.en: The younger sister had always worn a yoke.
We have ridded the earth of his shadow and liberated its peoples from his yoke.
sentences.cn: 我们把他的影子从地球上消除尽净,把世界上的人民从他的压迫下解放出来.

trans.tran_cn: 轭，架，座，偏转线圈，奴役，羁绊，束缚，统治，（同一轭上牛的）一对牲口，上衣抵肩
trans.tran_en: a wooden bar used for keeping two animals together, especially cattle, when they are pulling heavy loads

trans.tran_cn: 结合，给…上轭，结合，联结，使成配偶
trans.tran_en: to closely connect two ideas, people, or things
